# mi-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                    | Type                                                | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `icon`    | `icon`    | Icon 名，支持远程svg icon和自定义svg dom | `HTMLElement \| string`                             | `undefined` |
| `lazy`    | `lazy`    | 是否图标进入即将可视化区域后加载               | `boolean`                                           | `false`     |
| `props`   | --        | 其他属性,如aria-无障碍属性等              | `{ [prop: string]: any; }`                          | `undefined` |
| `spinner` | `spinner` | 设置图标的旋转动画                      | `boolean`                                           | `undefined` |
| `theme`   | `theme`   | 设置图标的类型                        | `"filled" \| "outlined" \| "rounded" \| "two-tone"` | `'filled'`  |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name      | Description |
| --------- | ----------- |
| `--color` | 图标的颜色       |
| `--size`  | 图标的大小       |
